property.name: Text
property.value: α: –1 for each clue you have. β: –3. If you fail, place 1 resource on the nearest Mutated enemy, as a mutation. γ: –3. If you fail, draw the top Hex card in the encounter discard pile. δ: –4. If you fail, place one card committed to this skill test facedown underneath an Insect enemy, as a swarm card.

property.name: Text
property.value: α: –2 for each clue you have. β: –4. Place 1 resource on each Mutated enemy, as a mutation. γ: –4. Draw the top Hex card in the encounter discard pile. δ: –5. Place each card committed to this skill test facedown underneath an Insect enemy, as a swarm card.

property.name: Text
property.value: *This agenda has a global doom threshold of 6 per group. Forced – When this agenda advances: If you are playing in Single Group Mode, remove 6 doom from it and move all excess doom to the next blue agenda. If you are playing in Epic Multiplayer Mode, move all doom and wards from it to the next blue agenda.

property.name: Text
property.value: If you are playing in Standalone Mode, add 1 γ token to the chaos bag. Shuffle the 2 set-aside Ethereal Entity enemies, the 3 Inevitable End treacheries, and the encounter discard pile into the encounter deck. If this is the first agenda to advance to 1b, spawn the set-aside Hune-Stitched Herald enemy at the Athenaeum of the Empty Sky.

property.name: Text
property.value: *This agenda has a global doom threshold of 6 per group. Forced – When this agenda advances: If you are playing in Single Group Mode, remove 6 doom from it and move all excess doom to the next blue agenda. If you are playing in Epic Multiplayer Mode, move all doom and wards from it to the next blue agenda.

property.name: Text
property.value: If you are playing in Standalone Mode, add 1 γ token to the chaos bag. If the Hune-Stitched Herald enemy is set-aside, shuffle it into the encounter deck. If this is the first agenda to advance to 2b, spawn the set-aside The Inescapable Maw enemy at the Athenaeum of the Empty Sky.

property.name: Text
property.value: *This agenda has a global doom threshold of 6 per group. Forced – When this agenda advances: If you are playing in Single Group Mode, remove 6 doom from it and move all excess doom to the set-aside Silenus Descends agenda. If you are playing in Epic Multiplayer Mode, move all doom and wards from it to the set-aside Silenus Descends agenda.

property.name: Text
property.value: If you are playing in Standalone Mode, add 1 γ token to the chaos bag. Flip Hub Dimension to its (Gateway to Destruction) side. If Hub Dimension is not in play, put it into play, (Gateway to Destruction) side faceup. Spawn the set-aside Silenus enemy at Hub Dimension. Search the encounter deck, encounter discard pile, and each play area for all green and red encounter cards and remove them from the game. Shuffle the encounter deck. Remove each agenda and act from the game and put the set-aside Silenus Descends agenda into play.

property.name: Text
property.value: *This agenda has a global doom threshold of 6 per group. Forced – When this agenda advances: If you are playing in Single Group Mode, remove 6 doom from it and move all excess doom to the next green agenda. If you are playing in Epic Multiplayer Mode, move all doom and wards from it to the next green agenda.

property.name: Text
property.value: If you are playing in Standalone Mode, add 1 β token to the chaos bag. If the Horrific Shoggoth enemy is set-aside, shuffle it into the encounter deck. If this is the first agenda to advance to 1b, spawn the set-aside Vile Broodmaster enemy at the Shrine of Magh’an Ark’at.

property.name: Text
property.value: *This agenda has a global doom threshold of 6 per group. Forced – When this agenda advances: If you are playing in Single Group Mode, remove 6 doom from it and move all excess doom to the next green agenda. If you are playing in Epic Multiplayer Mode, move all doom and wards from it to the next green agenda.

property.name: Text
property.value: If you are playing in Standalone Mode, add 1 β token to the chaos bag. If the Horrific Shoggoth enemy is set-aside, shuffle it into the encounter deck. If this is the first agenda to advance to 2b, spawn the set-aside Vile Broodmaster enemy at the Shrine of Magh’an Ark’at.

property.name: Text
property.value: *This agenda has a global doom threshold of 6 per group. Forced – When this agenda advances: If you are playing in Single Group Mode, remove 6 doom from it and move all excess doom to the set-aside The Egg Hatches agenda. If you are playing in Epic Multiplayer Mode, move all doom and wards from it to the set-aside The Egg Hatches agenda.

property.name: Text
property.value: If you are playing in Standalone Mode, add 1 β token to the chaos bag. Flip Hub Dimension to its (Gateway to Destruction) side. If Hub Dimension is not in play, put it into play, (Gateway to Destruction) side faceup. Spawn the set-aside Magh’an Ark’at enemy at Hub Dimension. Search the encounter deck, encounter discard pile, and each play area for all blue and red encounter cards and remove them from the game. Shuffle the encounter deck. Remove each agenda and act from the game and put the set-aside The Egg Hatches agenda into play.

property.name: Text
property.value: *This agenda has a global doom threshold of 6 per group. Forced – When this agenda advances: If you are playing in Single Group Mode, remove 6 doom from it and move all excess doom to the next red agenda. If you are playing in Epic Multiplayer Mode, move all doom and wards from it to the next red agenda.

property.name: Text
property.value: If you are playing in Standalone Mode, add 1 δ token to the chaos bag. Shuffle 3 of the 4 set-aside Trylogog enemies, the 2 Transmogrify treacheries, and the encounter discard pile into the encounter deck. If this is the first agenda to advance to 1b, spawn the remaining set-aside Trylogog enemy. That enemy gains an additional swarming 2.

property.name: Text
property.value: *This agenda has a global doom threshold of 6 per group. Forced – When this agenda advances: If you are playing in Single Group Mode, remove 6 doom from it and move all excess doom to the next red agenda. If you are playing in Epic Multiplayer Mode, move all doom and wards from it to the next red agenda.

property.name: Text
property.value: If you are playing in Standalone Mode, add 1 δ token to the chaos bag. If a copy of Trylogog is set-aside, shuffle it into the encounter deck. If this is the first agenda to advance to 2b, spawn the set-aside Droning Horde enemy at the Burning Pit.

property.name: Text
property.value: *This agenda has a global doom threshold of 6 per group. Forced – When this agenda advances: If you are playing in Single Group Mode, remove 6 doom from it and move all excess doom to the set-aside Ezel-zen-rezl Emerges agenda. If you are playing in Epic Multiplayer Mode, move all doom and wards from it to the set-aside Ezel-zen-rezl Emerges agenda.

property.name: Text
property.value: If you are playing in Standalone Mode, add 1 δ token to the chaos bag. Flip Hub Dimension to its (Gateway to Destruction) side. If Hub Dimension is not in play, put it into play, (Gateway to Destruction) side faceup. Spawn the set-aside Ezel-zen-rezl enemy at Hub Dimension. Search the encounter deck, encounter discard pile, and each play area for all blue and green encounter cards and remove them from the game. Shuffle the encounter deck. Remove each agenda and act from the game and put the set-aside The Swarm Spreads agenda into play.

property.name: Text
property.value: Forced – When any amount of doom is placed on a player card: Place that amount of doom on any agenda as well. Objective – Investigators may only spend the requisite number of clues if no Cultist enemies are in play.

property.name: Text
property.value: Put the set-aside Hub Dimension location into play, (Unsealed) side faceup.

property.name: Text
property.value: η If you are at a Ritual Site: You try to seal off the portal. Place 1 of your clues around Hub Dimension. Then you may test.ά (2) or έ (2). If you succeed, place 1 of your clues around Hub Dimension. Forced – When any amount of doom is placed on a player card: Place that amount of doom on any agenda as well. Objective – If your group has "sealed off the Hub Dimension," advance.

property.name: Text
property.value: If you are playing in Single Group Mode: The investigators have sealed Earth away from the cataclysmic war of the Outer Gods. (→R1) If you are playing in Epic Multiplayer Mode: Place 2 wards on each agenda. Advance to act 3a.

property.name: Text
property.value: η: If you are at a Ritual Site: You try to seal off another portal. Test ά (3) or έ (3). If you succeed, place 1 of your clues around another group’s Hub Dimension. Forced – When any amount of doom is placed on a player card: Place that amount of doom on any agenda as well. Objective – If each group has "sealed off the Hub Dimension," advance.

property.name: Text
property.value: The investigators have sealed Earth away from the cataclysmic war of the Outer Gods. (→R1)

property.name: Text
property.value: Arkham cannot have attachments. θ Spend 1π resources: Move to a connecting location.

property.name: Text
property.value: η η Deal 3 damage to a non-Ancient One enemy at a Providence location in any group. (Group limit once per game.)

property.name: Text
property.value: θ Draw the top card of the encounter deck: Place 1 ward on the blue agenda. (Group limit once per round.)

property.name: Text
property.value: η Test ί (4). If you succeed, gain 1 clue (from the token pool).

property.name: Text
property.value: η η Deal 3 damage to a non-Ancient One enemy at a Montreal location in any group. (Group limit once per game.)

property.name: Text
property.value: η Test ά (4). If you succeed, gain 1 clue (from the token pool).

property.name: Text
property.value: θ Draw the top card of the encounter deck: Place 1 ward on the green agenda. (Group limit once per round.)

property.name: Text
property.value: η η Deal 3 damage to a non-Ancient One enemy at a New York City location in any group. (Group limit once per game.)

property.name: Text
property.value: θ Draw the top card of the encounter deck: Place 1 ward on the red agenda. (Group limit once per round.)

property.name: Text
property.value: η Test ή (4). If you succeed, gain 1 clue (from the token pool).

property.name: Text
property.value: While there are 6π or more clues around Hub Dimension, your group has “sealed off the Hub Dimension.”

property.name: Text
property.value: Hub Dimension cannot have attachments. Hub Dimension is connected to each Ritual Site, and vice versa. η Test ά (2) or έ (2). If you succeed, spend 3 clues or remove 2 clues from around Hub Dimension to deal 2 damage to an Ancient One enemy (if you succeed by 3 or more, instead deal 3 damage).

property.name: Text
property.value: Aloof. Warring. Spawn – Athenaeum of the Empty Sky. Forced – At the end of the round, if no green or red enemies are in play: Place 1 doom on the blue agenda.

property.name: Text
property.value: Revelation – You must decide (choose one): – Place 1 doom on the blue agenda. – You and each asset you control take 1 direct damage. – Choose an Item asset you control and remove it from the game.

property.name: Text
property.value: Aloof. Warring. Spawn – Shrine of Magh’an Ark’at. Forced – At the end of the round, if no blue or red enemies are in play: Place 1 doom on the green agenda.

property.name: Text
property.value: Revelation – Attach Predator’s Call to the nearest green enemy. If that enemy is Mutated, place 1 resource on it, as a mutation. If no green enemies are in play, Predator’s Call gains surge. Attached enemy gets +1 fight, +1 evade, +1 damage, and +1 horror.

property.name: Text
property.value: Aloof. Warring. Spawn – Burning Pit. Forced – At the end of the round, if no blue or green enemies are in play: Place 1 doom on the red agenda.

property.name: Text
property.value: Revelation – Test ά (2). Increase the difficulty of this test by 1 for each swarm card in play. If you fail, take 2 horror (if you fail by 4 or more, instead take 3 horror).

property.name: Text
property.value: Revelation – Test ί (4). If you fail, either take 2 damage or place 2 of your clues on your location (if you fail and have 4 or more clues, do both instead).

property.name: Text
property.value: Revelation – Each non-Elite enemy moves and attacks as if it were the enemy phase. Enemies do not exhaust after attacking in this way. If no attacks were made as a result of this effect, Ravages of War gains surge.

property.name: Text
property.value: Revelation – For each Faction that has the most enemies in play, place 1 doom on that Faction’s agenda. If no enemies are in play, place no doom and While They Sleep gains surge.

property.name: Text
property.value: Each blue enemy loses aloof, loses warring, and gains hunter. Objective – If Silenus is defeated, (→R3).

property.name: Text
property.value: *Silenus has a global health pool of 8π. Hunter. Massive. Forced – When the mythos phase ends: Each investigator at Silenus’s location must decide (choose one) – – Place 1 doom on the blue agenda. – Remove each card in their hand from the game. – Take 3 horror.

property.name: Text
property.value: Hunter. Anytime an investigator is forced to “decide” by an ability on a blue card, they must choose two options instead of one.

property.name: Text
property.value: Warring. Forced – After Rune-Stitched Herald engages you: You must decide (choose one) – – Place 1 doom on the blue agenda. – Remove 2 clues from around Hub Dimension. – Hune-Stitched Herald attacks you.

property.name: Text
property.value: Warring. Spawn – Athenaeum of the Empty Sky. Forced – After Ethereal Entity engages you: You must decide (choose one) – – Place 1 doom on the blue agenda. – Place 1 of your clues on your location. – Take 2 horror.

property.name: Text
property.value: Warring. Spawn – Athenaeum of the Empty Sky. Forced – After Ethereal Entity engages you: You must decide (choose one) – – Place 1 doom on the blue agenda. – Place 1 of your clues on your location. – Take 2 horror.

property.name: Text
property.value: Revelation – You must decide (choose one): – Place 1 doom on the blue agenda. – Remove the top 6 cards of your deck from the game. Shuffle each weakness removed this way into your deck. – Choose 3 cards in your hand and remove them from the game.

property.name: Text
property.value: Each green enemy loses aloof, loses warring, and gains hunter. Objective – If Magh’an Ark’at is defeated, (→R4).

property.name: Text
property.value: *Magh’an Ark’at has a global health pool of 8π. Hunter. Massive. Retaliate. Forced – When the mythos phase ends: Place 1 resource on each Mutated enemy at Magh’an Ark’at’s location. Deal 1 damage to each investigator at this location for each mutation on Magh’an Ark’at.

property.name: Text
property.value: Hunter. Retaliate. Vile Broodmaster gets +1 health for each mutation on it. Forced – When 1 or more mutations would be placed on an enemy: Place 1 additional mutation on that enemy.

property.name: Text
property.value: Retaliate. Warring. Horrific Shoggoth gets +1 damage for each mutation on it. Forced – After Horrific Shoggoth attacks: Place 1 resource on it, as a mutation.

property.name: Text
property.value: Aloof. Retaliate. Warring. Spawn – Shrine of Magh’an Ark’at. Forced – When the round ends: Place 1 resource on Bringer of Paradise, as a mutation. Then, if there are 3 or more mutations on it, remove 2 of them and place 2 doom on the green agenda.

property.name: Text
property.value: Aloof. Retaliate. Warring. Spawn – Shrine of Magh’an Ark’at. Forced – When the round ends: Place 1 resource on Bringer of Paradise, as a mutation. Then, if there are 3 or more mutations on it, remove 2 of them and place 2 doom on the green agenda.

property.name: Text
property.value: Revelation – Place 1 resource on the Mutated enemy with the highest fight, as a mutation. That enemy readies, moves (one location at a time) until it reaches your location, and engages you. Then, it attacks you. If no Mutated enemies are in play, Hunt Down gains surge.

property.name: Text
property.value: Each red enemy loses aloof, loses warring, and gains hunter. Objective – If Ezel-zen-rezl is defeated, (→R2).

property.name: Text
property.value: *Ezel-zen-rezl has a global health pool of 7π. Hunter. Massive. Forced – When the mythos phase ends Each investigator at Ezel-zen-rezl’s location chooses both a card from their hand and an asset they control and places them facedown underneath an Insect enemy as swarm cards.

property.name: Text
property.value: Hunter. Swarming 6. Forced – After Droning Horde enters play: Each investigator chooses a card from their hand and places it facedown underneath an Insect enemy as a swarm card. Forced – When Droning Horde attacks: It deals either its damage or its horror, instead of both.

property.name: Text
property.value: Swarming 2. Warring. Spawn – Burning Pit. Forced – When Trylogog attacks: It deals either its damage or its horror, instead of both.

property.name: Text
property.value: Swarming 2. Warring. Spawn – Burning Pit. Forced – When Trylogog attacks: It deals either its damage or its horror, instead of both.

property.name: Text
property.value: Revelation – Place an asset you control facedown underneath an Insect enemy as a swarm card. If no Insect is in play, search the encounter deck and discard pile for a Trylogog and spawn it. Shuffle the encounter deck.

property.name: Text
property.value: Uses (4 charges). ι When a non-Elite enemy would engage you, spend 1 charge: Exhaust that enemy instead.

property.name: Text
property.value: Fast. Forced – After Pocket Portal enters play: Place your investigator mini-card onto Pocket Portal and immediately end your turn. While your mini-card is on Pocket Portal, you are not at any location and enemies cannot spawn engaged with you. At the start of your turn, discard Pocket Portal and move to any revealed location.

property.name: Text
property.value: Uses (3 charges). η Spend 1 charge: Choose one – – Place a non-Elite enemy at your location on top of the encounter deck. – Look at the top 5 cards of the encounter deck. Discard 2 of them and return the rest to the top, in any order.

property.name: Text
property.value: θ Exhaust Blade of Ark’at and spend 1 resource: Place 1 resource on Blade of Ark’at (from the token pool). η Fight. You get +1 ή for each resource on Blade of Ark’at. If you succeed, remove up to 3 resources from Blade of Ark’at to deal that much additional damage to the attacked enemy.

property.name: Text
property.value: θ Exhaust Enchanted Skull: Place the top card of your deck facedown underneath Enchanted Skull. θ You get +1 to this skill test for each card underneath Enchanted Skull. Then discard 1 card from underneath Enchanted Skull, at random. (Limit once per turn.)
